clip.quote: When people don't say, 'Hey, we're so fun to work with,' but say, 'Thank you for your professionalism,' that's when you know you're doing it right.
clip.why_clipworthy: It emphasizes the importance of professionalism over personality in building a successful business.
clip.suggested_hook: Why professionalism beats personality in real estate success.
